m_szDocTitle: Technology a driving force at Boston's auto show - Entertainment & Life - providencejournal.com - Providence, RI
m_szDocSumamry: Technology a driving force at Boston's auto show Lamborghini Huracan and hydrogen fuel cell Toyota Mirai among highlights of the show, which runs through Monday. Comment By Peter C.T, Elsworth Journal Staff Writer Posted Jan. 15, 2016 at 2:05 pm Updated Jan 15, 2016 at 2:33 PM BOSTON — It's a good show at the Boston Convention Center, with a wide range of vehicles crammed into the huge space. The New England International Auto Show includes such gas-guzzling crowd pleasers as the Rolls-Royce Wraith and Lamborghini Huracan, along with the hydrogen fuel cell Toyota Mirai, which is alongside
